name: US Corn Yields - USDA (2023)
title: US Corn Yields - USDA (2023)
description: This data is sourced from the USDA-NASS database. This reports survey data on corn yields in bushels per acre. To convert these values to tonnes per hectare, we have used a conversion factor of 0.06725.

sources.name: USDA National Agricultural Statistics Service Information
sources.additionalInfo: This data is sourced from the USDA-NASS database. This reports survey data on corn yields in bushels per acre. To convert these values to tonnes per hectare, we have used a conversion factor of 0.06725.
sources.dataPublishedBy: USDA National Agricultural Statistics Service Information

owidTags: Land Use and Yields in Agriculture
